celebrated their sixtieth wedding anniversary.

1531.52.text:
His
secret to a long and happy marriage? Give

1534.55.text:
extra love, Case says, and always respect
each other.

1538.97.text:
We'd like to thank Kauai born Daniel Case
of Honolulu for sharing his story. And thank

1545.15.text:
you for
joining us. For PBS Hawaii and Long Story

1549.13.text: Short, I'm Leslie Wilcox. A hui hou.

1574.07.text:
You did something after your wedding at Oahu
Country Club.

1578.98.text: That is still remembered. What did you do?

1582.61.text:
We hired a bicycle built for two. So, after
all the hoopla went on, we went out and got

1590.78.text:
out bike, and
pedaled through the port cochere waving, and

1594.97.text:
headed out. [CHUCKLE] So, that was a little
unusual.

1597.23.text:
The last your guests saw of you, you were
on a bicycle built for two.

1602.67.text:
We went so fast, I don't think anybody, including
us, knew what was happening. [CHUCKLE]
